name: Astroline (WayfarerGames, Dieck)
description:
One life. Three buttons. Infinite enemies. Got what it takes?

Move left and right to dodge endless waves of bullets and enemies in this hyper intense competitive shmup. Spawn 5 clones with a super attack, and top the leaderboard!

Credits:

- Shapes by Freya Holmer: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/shapes-173167

- MP UI kit: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/modern-procedural-ui-kit-163041

- Polygon Arsenal (sound effects): https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/polygon-arsenal-109286

- Lemon Milk - Font

- Bulletfury: https://wayfarergames.itch.io/bulletfury
